# The Main Interface

2021-05-09 18:43

The main interface of Mini Program Studio mainly contains following components:

- Menu bar: including files, editor, window and other basic software settings, these settings are similar with the settings of normal development software.

- Tool bar: including functions such as associating Mini Program, toggling displays, preview, remote debug, upload and other functions for Mini Program.

- Function panel: including project file management, search, [git management](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/mini-program-studio_function-panel_git-management), [NPM package management](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/mini-program-studio_function-panel_npm-package-management) and other functions.

- Editor: for Mini Program coding.

- Simulator: [local simulator](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/mini-program-studio_debugging_ide-debugging) for previewing Mini Program and [remote debugging](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev-old/mini-program-studio_debugging_remote-debugging).
